data.quote: Words and appearances are merely a symptom of a greater internal problem.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: The Three Fundamentals are: 1. Creating an attractive and enriching lifestyle. 2. Overcoming your fears and anxiety around socializing, intimacy and sexuality. 3. Mastering the expression of your emotions and communicating fluidly.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Seduction is the process by which a man induces a woman to become as invested in him as he is in her.
data.author: Mark Manson
